name: OpenSubtitles.org Extreme Crap Removal
description: This is basically the same as "OpenSubtitles.org Crap Removal", but I've modified it to remove everything except the search bar and search results (even the menu). This is not for everyone. Enjoy! Before: http://i31.tinypic.com/206k3tz.jpg After: http://i25.tinypic.com/2qxm9mg.jpg
